name: wordle-date
description: Wordle Date! Convert any date to its Wordle Date.  The Wordle Date is the number assigned to that day's Wordle Puzzle... which is the number of days before or after Wordle #0 (June 19, 2021), AKA Wordle Morning, AKA 0 WD.  Dates before 0 WD are represented by a negative number
author: Dustin Huth
